20101222020241.000|20101222020243.000|CC1|SURE DOESN'T MAKE IT EASY FOR   
20101222020243.000|20101222020243.000|CC1|EVERYBODY.

20101222020244.000|20101222020246.000|CC1|MIDNIGHT WHEN A EUCALYPTUS TREE 
20101222020246.000|20101222020250.000|CC1|SOAKED FROM THE UNRELENTING     
20101222020250.000|20101222020251.000|CC1|DELUGE CAME DOWN ON POWER LINES 
20101222020251.000|20101222020253.000|CC1|THAT PULLED DOWN ONE POLE AFTER 
20101222020253.000|20101222020254.000|CC1|ANOTHER, EIGHT IN ALL.          
20101222020254.000|20101222020255.000|CC1|>> THERE WERE HUGE EXPLOSIONS   
20101222020255.000|20101222020259.000|CC1|AND IT SOUNDED LIKE TREES       
20101222020259.000|20101222020259.000|CC1|CRASHING.                       
20101222020259.000|20101222020300.000|CC1|SKY WAS LIT UP AND IT SCARED THE
20101222020300.000|20101222020302.000|CC1|CHILDREN TO DEATH.              
20101222020302.000|20101222020303.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE ALL CONNECTED AND    
20101222020303.000|20101222020305.000|CC1|THEY FELL DOWN.                 
20101222020305.000|20101222020306.000|CC1|>> LIKE DOMINOS TOPPLING?       
20101222020306.000|20101222020308.000|CC1|>> EXACTLY.                     
20101222020308.000|20101222020310.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DONNA LEE TOLD US  
20101222020310.000|20101222020313.000|CC1|THE POLES ALONG THE ROAD CARRY  
20101222020313.000|20101222020315.000|CC1|DISTRIBUTION LINES AND HIGH     
20101222020315.000|20101222020316.000|CC1|VOLTAGE TRANSMISSION LINES.     
20101222020316.000|20101222020318.000|CC1|TO ONE WAS HURT WHEN THEY CAME

20101222020428.000|20101222020429.000|CC1|TOMORROW 6 TO 8.

20101222020431.000|20101222020433.000|CC1|THE COAST, TO SANTA CLARITA     
20101222020433.000|20101222020434.000|CC1|VALLEY.                         
20101222020434.000|20101222020436.000|CC1|45 TO 65 MILE AN HOUR WINDS ARE 
20101222020436.000|20101222020438.000|CC1|POSSIBLE IN THE I-5 CORRIDOR    
20101222020438.000|20101222020439.000|CC1|THROUGH THE ANTELOPE VALLEY AND 
20101222020439.000|20101222020440.000|CC1|HAVE THE POSSIBILITY OF         
20101222020440.000|20101222020441.000|CC1|THUNDERSTORMS WITH GUSTY WINDS, 
20101222020441.000|20101222020444.000|CC1|HAIL, AND A LOT OF RAIN IN A    
20101222020444.000|20101222020445.000|CC1|BRIEF PERIOD OF TIME.

20101222020447.000|20101222020448.000|CC1|GOING TO TALK ABOUT HOW MUCH

20101222020450.000|20101222020452.000|CC1|COULD EQUAL OR BETTER THE AMOUNT
20101222020452.000|20101222020455.000|CC1|OF RAIN THEY'VE GOTTEN SO FAR,

20101222020502.000|20101222020504.000|CC1|WHEN YOU FACTOR IN 45 TO 65 MILE

20101222020850.000|20101222020854.000|CC1|TAPE, A FIGHT AT MEL'S DINER IN 
20101222020854.000|20101222020855.000|CC1|WEST HOLLYWOOD.

20101222020857.000|20101222020857.000|CC1|VIDEO.                          
20101222020857.000|20101222020859.000|CC1|NO WORD ON WHAT SPARKED THE     
20101222020859.000|20101222020900.000|CC1|EARLY MORNING FIGHT WHICH       
20101222020900.000|20101222020904.000|CC1|EVENTUALLY MOVED OUT INTO THE   
20101222020904.000|20101222020904.000|CC1|PARKING LOT WHERE SEVERAL MORE  
20101222020904.000|20101222020905.000|CC1|PUNCHES WERE THROWN.

20101222020906.000|20101222020907.000|CC1|SEVERAL PEOPLE.
